author: priya
content: my house phone always make sound. because of that my wifi also got problem. cannot connect at all.. how many times i already call and make complaint. but non of u came n solve the problem... i dont know what say la... please la.. i also got lot of work to do.. i cant keep on call to u all everyday... my hse fon cant use at all!!! realy make me angry....!!! please overcome my proble immediately!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
